# AIsbom: AI Supply Chain Security

AIsbom provides a platform and CLI for generating software bills of materials directly from machine learning binary weights like PyTorch (.pt), Safetensors, and GGUF.

## Platform Features

### Artifact Inspector (Viewer)
URL: https://aisbom.io/viewer.html
Description: A client-side, local offline viewer for CycloneDX and SPDX files outputted by AIsbom CLI. It categorizes dependencies, machine learning models, and legal risks without uploading tensors.

### Simulated Dashboard (Live Demo)
URL: https://aisbom.io/demo.html
Description: A browser-based functional demonstration of the commercial AIsbom Enterprise interface, showing compliance scores, automated rule processing, and policy-driven governance.

## Key Open Source Project Links
GitHub Repository: https://github.com/Lab700xOrg/aisbom
PyPI Package: pip install aisbom-cli
